alert.note: Alert for Bollinger; Cape Girardeau; Perry (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 10:05PM CDT until July 12 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bollinger County in southeastern Missouri... Southwestern Perry County in southeastern Missouri... Cape Girardeau County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1004 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Perryville to near Cobalt, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson. This includes Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 101 and 130. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
